message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $90 feels a bit high for me. Would you consider $70?
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $82.50
Thanks for countering, Alice.  I'm willing to go a bit higher, how about $75?

I'm glad you're willing to meet me halfway, Bob. I can see you're serious about getting this product. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make a decent profit. I can offer it to you for $80
